text: asalamam loko eka ja jutha hata allaha ta'ala'e payagambarone subhasucana apanara ane daravanara banavine mokalya ane te'oni sathe-sathe saci kitaba avatarita kari, jethi lokona dareka jhaghadano nirnaya avi jaya ane phakata te ja loko'e- jemane kitaba apavamam avi hati potani pase purava avi gaya chatam andara andara kharana karane temam jhaghado karyo, etala mate allaha ta'ala imanavala'one a jhaghadamam pana satya tarapha potani iccha vade margadarsana apyum ane allaha ta'ala jene icche satya margadarsana ape che
